00025 class Object: public Function {
00026     public:
00027         Object (const QString &, unsigned, unsigned);
00028         virtual ~Object ();
00029         virtual void ReInit (double, double, double,
00030                              double, double, double,
00031                              double, double, double);
00032 
00033         virtual void Transform (double Rxy, double Rxz, double Rxw,
00034                                 double Ryz, double Ryw, double Rzw,
00035                                 double Tx, double Ty, double Tz, double Tw);
00036         virtual void Project (double ScrW, double CamW, bool DepthCue4D);
00037         virtual void Draw (void);
00038 
00039     protected:
00040         unsigned NumVertices, NumSurfaces;
00041         VecMath::Vector<4> *X, *Xtrans;
00042         VecMath::Vector<3> *Xscr;
00043         float *R, *G, *B;
00044 
00045         unsigned *Surface[4];
00046 
00047         virtual VecMath::Vector<4> &f (double, double, double) { return F; }
00048 };

00053 class Hypercube: public Object {
00054 public:
00055     Hypercube (): Object ("Hypercube", 16, 24) {
00056         parameterNames.push_back("Size");
00057     }
00058     Hypercube (double _a, const VecMath::Vector<4> &_Center = VecMath::Vector<4>(0., 0., 0., 0.));
00059     virtual ~Hypercube() { }
00060   
00061     virtual void SetParameters (double _a = 0, double = 0, double = 0, double = 0) {
00062         a = _a; }
00063 
00064     virtual std::string description () {
00065         std::ostringstream out;
00066         out << "Hypercube (a = " << a << ")" << std::ends;
00067         return out.str ();
00068     }
00069 protected:
00070     virtual void Initialize();
00071     void DeclareSquare (unsigned, unsigned, unsigned, unsigned, unsigned);
00072 
00073     double a;
00074     VecMath::Vector<4> center;
00075 };

00080 class Sponge: public Hypercube {
00081 public:
00082     Sponge (unsigned level = 1, int distance = 1, double rad = 1,
00083             VecMath::Vector<4> Center = VecMath::Vector<4>(0., 0.,0., 0.));
00084     virtual ~Sponge ();
00085 
00086     virtual void Transform (double Rxy, double Rxz, double Rxw, 
00087                             double Ryz, double Ryw, double Rzw,
00088                             double Tx, double Ty, double Tz, double Tw);
00089     virtual void Project (double ScrW, double CamW, bool DepthCue4D);
00090     virtual void Draw (void);
00091 
00092     virtual void SetParameters (double _a = 0, double _b = 0, double _c = 0, 
00093                                 double = 0) {
00094         Level = (unsigned)_a;
00095         distance = (int)_b;
00096         rad = _c;
00097     }
00098 
00099     virtual void ReInit (double, double, double,
00100                          double, double, double,
00101                          double, double, double) {
00102         List.clear();
00103         Object::ReInit(0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0);
00104     }
00105 
00106     virtual std::string description () {
00107         std::ostringstream out;
00108         out << "Sponge (level = " << Level << ")" << std::ends;
00109         return out.str ();
00110     }
00111 protected:
00112     virtual void Initialize();
00113     virtual unsigned long MemRequired (unsigned);
00114     unsigned Level;
00115     std::vector<Hypercube *> List;
00116     int distance;
00117     double rad;
00118     VecMath::Vector<4> center;
00119 };

00124 class Pyramid: public Object {
00125 public:
00126     Pyramid (): Object ("Hyperpyramid", 5, 10) { 
00127         parameterNames.push_back("Size");
00128     }
00129     Pyramid (double _a, const VecMath::Vector<4> &_Center = VecMath::Vector<4> (0., 0., 0., 0.));

00131

00133                 a = _a; }
00134 
00135 protected:
00136     virtual void Initialize();
00137     void DeclareTriangle (unsigned, unsigned, unsigned, unsigned);
00138 
00139     VecMath::Vector<4> center;
00140     double a;
00141 };

00146 class Gasket: public Pyramid {
00147     public:
00148         Gasket (unsigned level = 1, double rad = 1, 
00149                 VecMath::Vector<4> Center = VecMath::Vector<4> (0., 0.,0., 0.));
00150         virtual ~Gasket() { }
00151 
00152         virtual void Transform (double Rxy, double Rxz, double Rxw, 
00153                                 double Ryz, double Ryw, double Rzw,
00154                                 double Tx, double Ty, double Tz, double Tw);
00155         virtual void Project (double ScrW, double CamW, bool DepthCue4D);
00156         virtual void Draw (void);
00157         virtual void SetParameters (double _a = 0, double _b = 0, 
00158                                     double = 0, double = 0) {
00159             Level = (unsigned)_a;
00160             rad = _b;
00161         }
00162         virtual void ReInit (double, double, double,
00163                              double, double, double,
00164                              double, double, double) {
00165             List.clear();
00166             Object::ReInit(0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0);
00167         }
00168 
00169     protected:
00170         virtual void Initialize();
00171         virtual unsigned long MemRequired (void);
00172         unsigned Level;
00173         std::vector<Pyramid *> List;
00174         double rad;
00175         VecMath::Vector<4> center;
